setup.title: Setup a new study
setup.content: This app will guide you through self-studies to see whether eating certain food affects your symptoms. During this study, you will be asked to eat certain foo on some days and not eat that food on other days. We will aslo help you track your symptoms by sending you daily remiinders to log them.

setup2.title: 1. Choose the symptoms you are experiencing

setup3.title: 2. Choose a Possible Cause
setup3.subtitle: Which possible trigger do you want to test?

setup3_1.title: 2.1 Testing effect of Large Meals
setup3_1.para1: On randomly pre-assinged days you will be asked to eat at least 8 grams of lactose during your first meal, ideally breakfast. It is ok to eat more than 8 grams on these days.
setup3_1.para2: On other pre-assigned days you will be asked not to eat lactose during your first meal. You can eat lactose after logging your symptoms 4 hours after the meal.
setup3_1.para3: Some examples of 8 grams of lactose are:
setup3_1.list1: A cup of cottage cheese (225 grams)
setup3_1.list2: A glass of cow's milk (8 oz)

setup3_2.title: 2.2 Testing Lactose / Dairy Consumption
setup3_2.para1: On randomly pre-assinged days you will be asked to eat at least 8 grams of lactose during your first meal, ideally breakfast. It is ok to eat more than 8 grams on these days.
setup3_2.para2: On other pre-assigned days you will be asked not to eat lactose during your first meal. You can eat lactose after logging your symptoms 4 hours after the meal.
setup3_2.para3: Some examples of 8 grams of lactose are:
setup3_2.list1: A cup of cottage cheese (225 grams)
setup3_2.list2: A glass of cow's milk (8 oz)

setup3_3.title: 2.3 Testing impact of drinking Caffeine
setup3_3.para1: On randomly pre-assinged days you will be asked to eat at least 8 grams of lactose during your first meal, ideally breakfast. It is ok to eat more than 8 grams on these days.
setup3_3.para2: On other pre-assigned days you will be asked not to eat lactose during your first meal. You can eat lactose after logging your symptoms 4 hours after the meal.
setup3_3.para3: Some examples of 8 grams of lactose are:
setup3_3.list1: A cup of cottage cheese (225 grams)
setup3_3.list2: A glass of cow's milk (8 oz)

setup3_4.title: 2.4 Testing impact of eating Gluten
setup3_4.para1: On randomly pre-assinged days you will be asked to eat at least 8 grams of lactose during your first meal, ideally breakfast. It is ok to eat more than 8 grams on these days.
setup3_4.para2: On other pre-assigned days you will be asked not to eat lactose during your first meal. You can eat lactose after logging your symptoms 4 hours after the meal.
setup3_4.para3: Some examples of 8 grams of lactose are:
setup3_4.list1: A cup of cottage cheese (225 grams)
setup3_4.list2: A glass of cow's milk (8 oz)
